question: 連峰
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Take along</kanji> this <kanji>summit</kanji> and move it across a range, visiting more summits. One summit after another you take the summit along to. By covering this many summits, you notice there's a string of mountains. This is a <vocabulary>mountain range</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the rendaku.
